Title: Relates to an income tax credit for costs associated with implementing and complying with the farm laborers fair labor practices act
Summary: Establishes an income tax credit for costs associated with implementing and complying with the farm laborers fair labor practices act; includes increased labor, overtime, collective bargaining and workers' compensation costs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to an income tax credit for costs associated with implementing and complying with the farm laborers fair labor practices act
